name: Bullet and Powder
notes: Standard ammunition for firearms. Impale allows bullets to punch through gaps in armour, Penetrating helps overcome heavy protection.

name: Improvised Shot and Powder
notes: Makeshift ammunition from scrap metal or stones. Reduces effective range to half but maintains basic damage. Used when proper ammunition is unavailable.

name: Small Shot and Powder
notes: Multiple small pellets for scatter weapons. Blast +1 increases area of effect, devastating against groups at close range.

name: Arrow
notes: Standard arrows with iron or steel points. Can be recovered after combat if not broken.

name: Elf Arrow
notes: Masterwork arrows crafted by Elven fletchers. Superior materials provide extended range, increased damage, and multiple beneficial qualities. Sold individually.

name: Bolt
notes: Heavy quarrels with thick shafts and broad steel points. Particularly effective against armoured targets.

name: Lead Bullet
notes: Purpose-made lead bullets for slings. Dense metal provides increased damage and devastating blunt trauma, but reduces range by 10 yards.

name: Stone Bullet
notes: Smooth, rounded stones for sling use. Universally available and affordable, still capable of delivering crushing blows.
